messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] washing soda....??
messages.msgSnippet: I use Washing Soda... for me it has worked better than borax.  As far as I know, all A&H products are PH balanced and phosphate free. Blessings, Jenn Never
messages.messageBody:
I use Washing Soda... for me it has worked better than borax. As far as I
know, all A&H products are PH balanced and phosphate free.

Blessings,
Jenn
"Never tell a young person that anything cannot be done. God may have
been waiting centuries for someone ignorant enough of the impossible to do
that very thing." - John Andrew Holmes

"It is very nearly impossible... to become an educated person in a country
so distrustful of the independent mind." - James Baldwin



-----Original Message-----
From: panchot [mailto:panchot@...]
Sent: Monday, June 05, 2000 7:24 AM
To: Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] washing soda....??


Hi everybody, can anyone give me some info on 'washing soda'? Emily, 5,
found a recipe for growing crystals and it called for washing soda. We found
some, made by Arm and Hammer, and it appears to be very similar to Borax. I
use Borax in laundry and to pick up stains on the carpet and to wash the
floors, as it is supposed to be environmentally friendly. Does anyone know
if washing soda is as well?

Thanks!!!!

Brynn


"To be nobody but yourself in a world which is doing its best night and day
to make you like everybody else means to fight the hardest battle any human
being can fight and never stop fighting."
--e.e. cummings

messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] washing soda....??
messages.msgSnippet: I ll tell you-I ve NEVER seen my kitchen floor as clean as when I use it! And our floor gets really NASTY! B~ To be nobody but yourself in a world which is
messages.messageBody:
I'll tell you-I've NEVER seen my kitchen floor as clean as when I use it!
And our floor gets really NASTY!

B~


"To be nobody but yourself in a world which is doing its best night and day
to make you like everybody else means to fight the hardest battle any human
being can fight and never stop fighting."
--e.e. cummings



-----Original Message-----
From: Jeanette [mailto:jbecza@...]
Sent: Monday, June 05, 2000 11:49 AM
To: Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com
Subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] washing soda....??


I use Washing Soda... for me it has worked better than borax. As far as I
know, all A&H products are PH balanced and phosphate free.

Blessings,
Jenn

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Jill-organic food and allergies
messages.msgSnippet: Michelle, Thanks for rambling....I am just getting into organic and natural foods, so I am always interested in what others are doing and how the are thinking.
messages.messageBody:
Michelle,
Thanks for rambling....I am just getting into organic and natural foods, so I
am always interested in what others are doing and how the are thinking. You
make some very good points.

Happy Mothering,
Julie
Mommy to Ali and Matthew, Wife to a Great Man, Adam
Please check out a few of my favorite sites:
http://www.mothering.com
http://www.AttachmentParenting.org
http://www.LaLecheLeague.org
http://www.naturalchild.org
"It helps me to remember that people are more important than ideas and that
being kind is more important than being right."
-Peggy O'Mara, Publisher of Mothering Magazine.
